missions.name: Abandoned Land
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with dealing with a small camp near a military airfield.
missions.description:
**Abandoned Land** **Employer**
Chernarus Military **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Chernarus Military
AMLCOA: Defend their camp

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Chernarus Military

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
The camp may have non-military members

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
The area should be free of civilians, but there will be some in nearby towns **Mission**
The Chernaurs Military has been dealing with issues in their ranks. One such issue is a group of roughly 60 soldiers that have been doing their own training outside of the base during downtime. They have been doing this for a few months now, and the base commander has decided to send a team to investigate. The problem is he doesn't know the full membership of the group, and has decided to bring us in to help. We will be going in to the area and investigating the group.

Recent inventory has revealed a small number of static weapons, explosives, electronics and ammunition missing. Although not uncommon for some ammunition to go missing, the explosives and electronics are a bit more concerning.

We have been provided with two vehicles, but we can optionally bring some of our own as well.

missions.name: Dropping In
missions.summary: Contractors parachute into Kujari to retake a military airfield under rebel control.
missions.description:
**Dropping In** **Employer**
Kujari Military **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local rebel forces
AMLCOA: Defend their territorial gains, including the Airfield and nearby towns.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Kujari Military

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
May be present in nearby towns. **Mission**
A military airfield has been taken over by rebel forces. The airfield is a vital asset to the Kujari Military, and must be retaken.
We are being sent in via parachute to take back the airfield.

A smuggler will take two crates into the area, put any backpacks or other gear you need in them. They will be taken to the yellow area marked on the map.

Once you are ready, have the OL tell the smuggler you are ready to go, then plane will take off a few seconds later. The pilot will call when it is time to jump, double tap V once he calls GO GO GO.

Once you have your gear and regrouped, take the airfield and repel any enemy forces that try to take it back.

missions.name: Skilled Labour
missions.summary: Contractors are hired to take down a key member of a terrorist cell
missions.description:
**Skilled Labour** **Employer**
Dariyah Military **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
IDU Terrorists
AMLCOA: Attempt to repel the attack, extract the HVT
Confirmed Weapons: AKs, RPKs, RPGs, 2-4 DShKM

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Dariyah Military

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians are present in the AO

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Too rocky for vehicles, air insertion required. **Mission**
The Dariyah military has been trying to locate Abdul-Wahhab Ajani for several months.
He is a skilled tactician and leader that has carried out several successful operations against the Dariyah Forces.

He has been confirmed to currently be in the town of Anlif, but he has a sizeable force in the town with him.
We are tasked with assaulting the town, capturing or killing Ajani, and clearing out the town of any remaining resistance.
The Dariyah forces are too inexperienced to handle this mission, but they are nearby and will reinforce us near the end of the firefight to help us clear the town.
Once the objective is complete and the Dariyah forces are in place, we can return to our FOB.

missions.name: Unrestricted Access
missions.summary: Contractors clear out an insurgent roadblock
missions.description:
**Unrestricted Access** **Employer**
Local Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Insurgents
AMLCOA: Preventing traffic from crossing an important road.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors **Mission**
Insurgents have setup along a major road and are preventing traffic from crossing.
Synixe has been contracted to clear the road of insurgents.
We need to ensure traffic can enter the towns on both sides of the road safely.

Civilians report that insurgents have a ""large armoured vehicle"" and modified pickup trucks.

missions.name: Needle in a Haystack
missions.summary: Contractors Locate and destroy a weapons shipment
missions.description:
**Needle in a Haystack** **Employer**
NATO **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Takistani Militia


FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors




CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Confirmed by NATO surveilance that their are no civilians in the area.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Mountains and height differentiation everywhere. Only one road leading to the other side of mountains. **Mission**
With the fall of Aziz, the Takistani Militia has grown ten fold due to his cult-like followers. Deep in the Takistani Mountains, The militia has just recieved a weapons shipment presumably to arm their new soldiers. The exact location of the shipment is unknown. However, we know the weapons will be inside a Praga V3S REARM or REFUEL Truck. Destroying it or capturing it will surely lower the enemy's morale and have others lose faith in their cause.

A replica of the truck you are looking for has been parked at your FOB for reference, although their are many duplicates rumoured in the AO. Youll know you found the primary objective due to the sheer amount of weapons and ammunition inside. Furthermore, the truck itself will be guarded by a small team, no larger than 5 or 6. Surveillance shows almost every town to be heavily guarded, along with enemy technicals patrolling the area so plan your routes accordingly. Most importantly, their is one singular road leading in and out of the takistani mountains. With this being the enemy's only way to get supplies in and out, it is sure to be heavily fortified. God speed and Good Luck Gentleman!

Primary Objective: Secure the weapons truck and bring it back to FOB. If unable to, destroy the weapons truck instead.

missions.name: Basket Case
missions.summary: Contractors hunt down an arms dealer
missions.description:
**Basket Case** **Employer**
Interpol **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local militias
Stop us from getting information

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Pulau is mostly composed of thick jungles **Mission**
Interpol has hired Synixe to apprehend notorious arms dealer Viktor Orlov. Orlov has been escaping capture for several years but recently it has been discovered that he's been dealing with local militias in Pulau.

We must go around the area where it is known that the militia operates and see if we can find any information on Orlov's whereabouts.

ORLOV MUST BE CAPTURED ALIVE

missions.name: Economy of Death
missions.summary: Contractors are tasked with destroying stolen weaponry
missions.description:
**Economy of Death** **Employer**
D.O.D (Department of Defense) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Chernarussian Movement of the Red Star
Enemies will defend what they've stolen

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors


CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
No civilian pressence in the AO

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The AO has a thick forest **Mission**
A shipment of US weapons that was being transported to a country that's at war with Russia via train was ambushed. Unkown forces derailed the train and handed the weapons off to Chedaki insurgents who have now scattered them across the countryside.

The shipment consisted of:
-Two AN/MPQ-105 Radars
-Two MIM-145 Defender AA batteries
-Three UGV stompers, two of them being armed
-Two Mini-Spike launchers of the AA variety
-Two Mini-Spike launchers of the AT variety
-Two XM312 machine guns

Contractors are tasked with destroying the weapons so that no traces of US involvement are left

missions.name: Flight of Icarus
missions.summary: Contractors save the passangers of a crashed helicopter
missions.description:
**Flight of Icarus** **Employer**
Director boards of several companies. **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Unknown

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Theseus Inc

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Aside from the pressence of the VIPs, civilian pressence is expected in towns

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Terrain in the AO is hilly and covered by forests **Mission**
Two hours ago a helicopter carrying several businessmen and CEOs from different companies crashed while flying over Altis. It is unknown what caused the crashed but it is assumed that it was due to fowl weather conditions.

Synixe has been hired by the boards of the companies to which the men belong to act as a rescue force. We are tasked with finding the wreck and brigning any survivors back to our F.O.B. Theseus Inc was hired to provide bodyguards for the passengers and they have also asked us to bring their people back.

Should any of the VIPs die we must retrieve their bodies and bring them back to our F.O.B as well.

We have been provided with the passenger log of the helicopter in order to properly identify everyone.

missions.name: For Whom The Bell Tolls
missions.summary: Contractors gather evidence and arrest a sex trafficker
missions.description:
**For Whom The Bell Tolls** **Employer**
DOJ (Department of Justice) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Security guards
AMLCOA: Defend the target and his assets

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
There may be prisoners in the island

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The terrain in the island is pretty clear, providing open sight lines **Mission**
Recently the DOJ put out a warrant for the arrest of James Erling, a business mogul involved in a human trafficking ring. However before they could arrest him, Erling fled to his private island.

Since the island is outside of the DOJ's jurisdiction they have hired Synixe to infiltrate it and arrest Erling. Should there be any prisoners in the island they've asked us to secure them.

They have also agreed to pay us extra for any other evidence we can gather that would help their case against Erling.

missions.name: Garbageman
missions.summary: Contractors recover stolen NATO gear
missions.description:
**Garbageman** **Employer**
NATO **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Takistani Militia
AMLCOA: Protect the stolen gear.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
There is active civilian populace in the AO.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The terrain in the AO is mountainous. **Mission**
Two days ago a NATO convoy was ambushed by the Takistani Militia, this ambush resulted in the deaths of ten soldiers and the theft of a bunch of NATO supplies and gear.

NATO has hired Syinxe to track down the stolen items and recover them. The items are: three crates of basic weapons, two crates of grenades, two crates of launchers and an M-ATV HMG variant.

missions.name: Here Comes the Hotstepper
missions.summary: Contractors search for and rescue captured workers
missions.description:
**Here Comes the Hotstepper** **Employer**
Oil company operating out of Shapur **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Armed Forces of the Russian Federation
AMLCOA: Defend the territory they've taken

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
The only civilians present in the AO are the captured workers

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The terrain in Shapur if mostly flat. **Mission**
Recently the Armed Forces of the Russia Federation moved in and took over the territory of Shapur e-Dalanper, capturing the workers of the oil company established there and displacing the civilians that lived in the area.

Synixe has been hired to move into the area and find and rescue the team of 16 workers and the COO of the oil company who was overseeing operations.

missions.name: Hit the Road Vlad
missions.summary: Contractors lay the ground work for an invasion
missions.description:
**Hit the Road Vlad** **Employer**
Chernarussian Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Russian Armed Forces
Defend the areas they have taken control of

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians have already been evacuated from the island

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A **Mission**
Recently the Russian Armed Forces moved into Utes, killing Chernarussian forces stationed there and taking control of the island.

Synixe has been hired to lay the ground work for a Chernarussian retaking of the island. We are tasked with destroying key infrastructure that would aid the russians in defending their positions.

Contractors are to destroy:
- A radar and radio tower
- AA weaponry
- An ammo cache
- A fuel supply
- A transmitter tower
- Any vehicles that may give the Russians air superiority

We have been provided with aerial photos of the island as well as Stingers by the Chernarussians.

missions.name: Pusherman
missions.summary: Contractors sabotage a cartel
missions.description:
**Pusherman** **Employer**
Horizon Islands Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Cartel forces
They will protect their valuables and might escape in order to save them

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilian pressence in the town of Tavu

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Tanoa is characterized by it's jungle terrain **Mission**
The Horizon Islands government has hired Synixe to sabotage a cartel that has recently moved into the town of Tavu and an airfield.
The cartel is using the Tavu docks to bring in valuables by boat which they then load up into a plane and helicopter in the airfield in order to transport them.

The government wants Synixe to destroy everything key to the operation in both the town and the airfield.
Town:
-RHIBs
-Vans
-Wooden crates filled with cargo

Airfield:
-C-130
-CH-49 Mohawk
-Fuel truck
-ATC tower

The government has also provided us with recon pictures that their government took of both of the objectives.

missions.name: Something In The Way
missions.summary: Contractors investigate a shipwreck
missions.description:
**Something In The Way** **Employer**
Kingdom of Sahrani **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Looters
They are most likely going to be salvaging the ship and protecting anything they may have stolen.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Some survivors from the wreckage are expected.

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A **Mission**
Recently a ship that was meant to dock in Corazol has wrecked in the Abra de Boca. The Kingdom of Sahrani has hired Synixe to investigate the wreckage and locate the containers the ship was carrying along with the crew.

Should contractors find any of the containers they should tag them with a circle and drop a HI Yellow chemlight. If any survivors are found they should be brought back to the Corazol docks.

It is expected that looters will be at the site of the wreckage and they may have already ran off with some of the containers.

Contractors have been provided with diving equipment in order to properly investigate the wreckage as well as underwater rifles just in case.

missions.name: Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'
missions.summary: Contractors track down FIA weapon caches
missions.description:
**Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'** **Employer**
Altian Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Freedom and Independence Army (FIA)
AMLCOA: Hide and protect the caches.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
AAF

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The terrain in the AO is mostly composed of mountains and forests **Mission**
An AAF intel gathering operation found that the FIA has been planning an assault on the town of Oreokastro. The Government has evacuated the civilians from the town and has stationed some AAF troops there.

Since the town is already undermanned the Government has contracted Synixe to find the weapon caches the FIA are planning to use to assault the town and destroy them.

The intel the AAF has gathered says that there are six caches in the area around Oreokastro.

missions.name: Who's Ready For Tomorrow
missions.summary: Contractors track down a hacker
missions.description:
**Who's Ready For Tomorrow** **Employer**
Central Intelligence Agency (C.I.A) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Takistani militia
It is believed they've been working with the hacker themselves and that they'll protect him.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors


CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
No civilan pressence in the AO

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
N/A **Mission**
A month ago a CIA black site was wiped out. The takistani militia took credit for the attack and claimed that more would come.

After gathering information and doing surveillance the CIA found out that the Takistanis have been working with a hacker in order to learn about american positions in the region.

Contractors have been hired to apprehend the hacker and extract him out of the region.

Through tracking a series of keystrokes the CIA has learned that the militia has been mainting contact with the hacker mainly from the town of Abad

missions.name: Back To The Basics
missions.summary: Contractors remove AA threats and deliver needed supplies
missions.description:
**Back To The Basics** **Employer**
IDAP and the Tanoan Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Syndikat
AMLCOA: Although made up mostly of amateur bandits, will ambush contractors using explosives and heavy weapons.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Gendarmerie

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
N/A

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians present in every populated area

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Most of the surface area of Tanoa is taken up by jungles, exception being in cities, towns, villages, and roads. **Mission**
Because of a recent famine, Syndikat has been overtly attacking government officials and Gendarmerie, trying to gain power on Tanoa. These attacks spread to IDAP convoys and workers once the NGO started their work on the island, trying to bring food, water, and medical aid to the populace.

In a last bid to control the IDAP supplies coming to the island, Syndikat decided to lock down the two airports on the main Tanoan Island using multiple AA emplacements, which is where both IDAP and the Tanoan Government decided to hire Contractors to clear the AA threat to the southern Tanoan Airport and protect and deliver IDAP supplies to 3 locations: The IDAP Base Camp, and two Aid Stations in Georgetown and Tanouka.

The supplies that contractors have been hired to protect consist of food, water, medical, and equipment boxes. While the food and water will need to be delivered to each IDAP location specified, the medical supplies and equipment will only need to be delivered to the IDAP Base Camp. However, while the food and water boxes were able to be safely delivered to the Saint-George Airport, the helicopter that was dropping the medical supplies and equipment was forced to make an emergency landing at the Bala Airstrip after taking heavy fire from Syndikat forces.

As for the AA sites, the Gendarmerie have narrowed the locations of each confirmed AA site to the corresponding areas on the map (Red Circles). There should be no AA expected outside these areas.

missions.name: Skyfire
missions.summary: Contractors Locate and Destroy AA sites
missions.description:
**Skyfire** **Employer**
AAF **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Rebel Forces
Likely to shoot on sight

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, AAF

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
No Civilians Expected

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Dense Fog conditions **Mission**
AAF were in the process of recaptuiring Stratis Island. During this activity, they noticed rebel forces starting to setup AA sites in the eastern forest area.

Due to sudden onset of bad weather, and low numbers AAF has opted to hire us to help them locate the AA sites and designate them for arterillary strike.

Expecting 3 camps of small unit AA camps in the forested area marked on map.

missions.name: Knock Knock
missions.summary: Contractors must secure an outpost of extremist militiamen.
missions.description:
**Knock Knock** **Employer**
Aliabad Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Militia

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
May be present in the surrounding area. **Mission**
We have been hired to take out an outpost of extremist militia in the area. The militia are known to be hostile to the local population and have been known to commit atrocities against them.

We have been tasked with taking out the militia and securing the area.

missions.name: Touring
missions.summary: Contractors provide counterinsurgency operations.
missions.description:
**Touring** **Employer**
Takistani Government **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Takistani Insurgents
Insurgents and deserters of the previous government's militia have joined forces in order to establish pressure over the new government, they may be equipped with surplus gear and are highly dangerous.

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, British Armed Forces

INDEPENDENT FORCES:
Local Insurgents
There is a small group of civilians which have formed their own local force to fight against the arising insurgency. They are supportive of both Synixe and the BAF.

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilians will be present in the area of operations.
**Mission**
Contractors have been deployed in Takistan to assist in counterinsurgency operations after a recent insurgent leader has been taken out.

Despite this, the insurgents have continued to pressure the government and have not given up their cause. As such, Synixe Contractors have been hired to assist in destabilising the insurgency.

Synixe has been assigned to recon over the towns of Falar, Garmarud and Bastam, additionally, it is known that the insurgents have taken over a military base at Garmsar. Should any insurgent supporters of the previous leader be found, Synixe is tasked with eliminating them.

We have intelligence that the BAF will be carrying an attack in Feruz Abad, against a taken over military base, at 2100. Joining them may make this task easier for us.

missions.name: Just a Friend
missions.summary: Contractors rescue an informant from execution
missions.description:
**Just a Friend** **Employer**
United Assistance Mission in Argana (UNMA) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Sefrwai Freedom and Independence Army (SFIA)
AMCLOA: Stop us from saving the informant

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, UNA forces

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
There are other civilians awaiting execution

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Sefrou-Ramal is mostly flat desert except for some sand dunes **Mission**
Yesterday in the middle of the night Abdul Hamadi was abducted from his home. Hamadi has been an informant for the UNA ever since they first arrived in the region, and the SFIA want him dead for giving up the location of several of their encapments. He is now awaiting execution, due to happen tomorrow morning.

The UNA has hired Synixe to save Hamadi from the SFIA base in which he is being held. Once Hamadi is brought back to base there is a helicopter with a crew in it waiting for him to be loaded in so that he can be taken out of the region.

We have been tasked with rescuing Hamadi and only Hamadi. We may free any other civilians being held and we may take them back if we want to but we are not being paid to save them. THE EXTRACTION IS ONLY FOR HAMADI.

missions.name: Last Resort
missions.summary: Contractors execute a kill or capture order on a Takistani Army officer
missions.description:
**Last Resort** **Employer**
Central Intelligence Agency (C.I.A) **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Local Cartel
AMLCOA: Protect the target

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
Civilian pressence expected in local towns and around the region

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
Terrain in the AO is mountainous and riddled with forests. **Mission**
The CIA is currently chasing a Takistani Army officer named Jabr Aybak who they suspect is attempting to put American lives in danger.

They attempted to capture him on a previous operation but he escaped. He is now under the protection of a local cartel who will attempt to smuggle him into the US.

The CIA has tasked Synixe to execute a kill or capture order on Aybak. If he is captured he must be brought back to base, but if he is killed his body should be retrieved for proper identification and to prevent the Takistanis from retrieving it.

missions.name: Christmas 2022
missions.summary: Civilians are forced to fight against evil to save Christmas
missions.description:
**Christmas 2022** **Employer**
Christmas Spirit **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Gran Rebelde de Invierno Nación contra Holidays (GRINCH)
AMLCOA: Try to kill any that support Santa and his Christmas objectives

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Civilian Resistance

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
All civilians have either fled or joined the resistance

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
It is snow, guns and equipment can be found scattered around and near settlements **Mission**
GRINCH has risen up to stop joyous holidays! Their first target is Christmas!
Your mission is to stop them from destroying Christmas!

Civilians have either fled or joined the resistance, we are joining the resistance, but we are scattered and lacking supplies.
We need to scavenge for supplies and fight back, but we need to be careful, GRINCH has a lot of soldiers and they are well equipped.

Try to regroup and make your way to Santa's FOB in the region, and arm up to defend Christmas against those who would destroy it!

missions.name: Spies vs Mercs
missions.summary: Spies will try to hack the laptops, mercs will try to protect them
missions.description:
**Spies vs Mercs** **Mission**
GAME RULES
1- Spies must break into the facility, hack all three of the laptops and escape back to base.
2- If you die you don't redeploy until the next game.
3- Game ends either when the laptops are hacked and at least one spy calls for the extraction or when all the spies are killed.
4- Mercs should have at least double the amount of spies

The idea is that mercs will have heavy armor, frags, flares, chemlights and assault weapons while the spies have nvgs, no armor, flashbangs, smokes and silenced cqb weapons.

missions.name: New Year's Eve 2022
missions.summary: Contractors attend a new year's eve party at the Tanoan governor's estate
missions.description:
**New Year's Eve 2022** **Employer**
Synixe Fun Department **Situation**
ENEMY FORCES:
Why would there be enemies? It's just a party
AMCLOA: I'd imagine that if there were any they would try to ruin all the fun

FRIENDLY FORCES:
Synixe Contractors, Gendarmerie

CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS:
The guests of the party

TERRAIN CONSIDERATIONS:
The governor's estate has light jungle on one side and a field on the other **Mission**
Dearest Contractor,

Due to your outstanding service to Tanoa you are hereby cordially invited to a new year's eve party by the great governor of Tanoa. The party will be taking place at the Governor's estate and will start at 21:00.

We have set you up at the best hotel in Tanoa that has three stars with a great view of the Georgetown bay. Your luggage will be waiting for you there with your clothes. Once you are ready your vehicles will be waiting for you outside the hotel so that you can go to the airort to ride the private helicopters that will take you to the island in which the party is in. You will arrive at the governor's private airfield where you will have vehicles waiting for you.

Should you not find a suitable pilot or prefer it this way, there are also private boats waiting for you at the Georgetown docks. From there you can go to the Katkoula docks were you will find vehicles waiting for you in order to be able to get to the estate.

The governor has also hired a fireworks connoisseur to prepare a beautiful display for you once you get back to the hotel from the party. You will find the controls for it at the hotel roof. Make sure to look towards the bay in order to see them.

He's also pre selected a set of 'sweet tunes' himself which if you wish you can start playing from the laptop in his office.

Cordially signed, Deputy Governor of Tanoa.

P.S: There's no need to worry about the revolutionaries that have threatened with killing everyone at the party. There is no proof that they exist or that their supreme leader rides around in an armored Hilux with a machine gun. Plus I'm sure that their supreme leader would only show up last if there was an attack because he's a coward.

missions.name: Synixe Training Facility
missions.summary: Premiere Training Facility for the Synixe Corporation
